examples: What did you eat for dinner last night?

definitions.text: eat a meal; take a meal
examples: We did not eat until 10 P.M. because there were so many phone calls
I didn't eat yet, so I gladly accept your invitation

definitions.text: take in food; used of animals only
examples: This dog doesn't eat certain kinds of meat

definitions.text: worry or cause anxiety in a persistent way

examples: this car consumes a lot of gas
They run through 20 bottles of wine a week

definitions.text: cause to deteriorate due to the action of water, air, or an acid
examples: The steady dripping of water rusted the metal stopper in the sink
